main event: A USAF pilot observed a white object while on a civil air patrol flight at approximately 11,000 feet altitude in Alabama.
interesting points: The sighting occurred on April 29, 1952, and lasted approximately 30 minutes., The object appeared to be stationary and did not reflect light., The object did not match any known type of aircraft or meteor., The evaluation by the Air Force concluded that the nature and origin of the object remain unknown., The report mentioned possible balloon activity in the area but did not confirm if it was related.
sighted object: one white stationary object in the sky
